home_tagline: Savor the authentic taste of tradition with every dish.
home_philosophy_text: At Swagat Indian Restaurant, we believe in crafting culinary experiences that delight the senses and warm the heart. We use only the freshest ingredients, sourced locally whenever possible, to bring you dishes that are both authentic and innovative. Our passion for food is reflected in every detail, from preparation to presentation.
home_special_description: A delightful blend of fresh ingredients and aromatic spices, perfect for a memorable meal.
heroSubtitle: Experience Authentic Indian Cuisine — A Culinary Journey
heroText: Delight your senses with our exquisite selection of traditional Indian dishes.
menuItem_biryaniRice_description: Our selection of fragrant Biryanis and delectable rice preparations, perfect as a main course or side.
menuItem_lamb_description: Tender and succulent lamb dishes, slow-cooked in rich gravies with aromatic spices.
menuItem_bread_description: A variety of freshly baked Indian breads, ideal for scooping up your favorite curries.
menuItem_seafood_description: Exquisite seafood dishes, from flavorful fish to succulent prawns, prepared with authentic Indian spices.
menuItem_dessert_description: Indulge in traditional Indian sweets and a refreshing assortment of ice creams.
menuItem_raita_description: Cool and refreshing yogurt-based side dishes, perfect for complementing spicy curries.
menuItem_chicken_description: A diverse range of chicken specialties, from creamy butter chicken to fiery vindaloo.
menuItem_saladStarter_description: Fresh, crisp salads and a tempting array of vegetarian appetizers to begin your meal.
menuItem_dalBBQ_description: Comforting lentil dishes and a selection of sizzling tandoori and barbeque delights.
menuItem_platter_description: A delightful assortment of various dishes, perfect for sampling a bit of everything.
menuItem_paneer_description: A special selection of dishes featuring fresh Indian cheese (paneer), cooked in a variety of delicious gravies.
menuItem_vegMain_description: A range of flavorful vegetarian main courses, made with fresh vegetables and aromatic spices.
about_hero_tagline: A journey of taste, tradition, and togetherness
about_story_text: Swagat Indian Restaurant was born from a passion for authentic Indian flavors and a commitment to creating unforgettable dining experiences. From our humble beginnings to becoming a beloved culinary destination, we have always believed in serving food made with heart, history, and the finest ingredients.
about_why_choose_us_subtitle: We blend tradition with innovation in every plate we serve
about_value_authentic_desc: We use age-old recipes and the freshest ingredients to bring you genuine flavors.
about_value_ambience_desc: Experience warm hospitality and a serene environment perfect for every occasion.
about_value_service_desc: Our staff goes the extra mile to make your visit comfortable and memorable.
about_atmosphere_text: Step into Swagat Indian Restaurant and immerse yourself in an ambiance that combines classic elegance with cozy comfort. Whether it's a casual meal or a special celebration, our inviting space is designed to make every moment memorable.
gallery_outdoor_desc: Enjoy a peaceful outdoor dining experience surrounded by nature, fresh air, and a relaxing atmosphere.
gallery_indoor_desc: Warm indoor seating with elegant décor and cozy traditional vibes.
gallery_food_desc: Authentic Indian cuisine prepared with fresh ingredients & love.
